long_description: The soft Chewie Teething Pad from Onya Baby covers both the shoulder straps and corners of your baby carrier. It's faced with organic cotton terrycloth, stays put and is machine washable. Rest easy knowing your baby is chewing on 100% certified organic cotton terrycloth. Pad won't slide up the straps and is backed with stretchy, water-resistant polyester. Position the Onya Baby Chewie Teething Pad where your baby chews most, and machine wash when your outing is done.
short_description: The soft Chewie Teething Pad from Onya Baby covers both the shoulder straps and corners of your baby carrier. It's faced with organic cotton terrycloth, stays put and is machine washable.
